actor-start.eventDescription: Initial fee for starting the SlideSpeak MCP Server

get-templates.eventDescription: Fee for listing available presentation templates from SlideSpeak.

generate-slide.eventDescription: Fee per slide generated by the generatePowerpoint tool using SlideSpeak API.

generate-slide-by-slide.eventDescription: Fee for generating presentations using slide-by-slide input with SlideSpeak API.

get-task-status.eventDescription: Fee for checking the status of a SlideSpeak generation task.
